name: note-mark
tagline: A markdown based note taking system with tagging
description: NoteMark is a Markdown-based note-taking system for quick writing and organizing ideas. It supports syntax highlighting, tagging, and a minimalist self-hosted UI ideal for personal usage.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write notes using Markdown syntax with live preview rendering

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize notes with tags for quick filtering and categorization

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find notes instantly by searching titles, content, or tags

features.title: Version History
features.description: Track changes to notes and restore previous versions if needed

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Download notes as Markdown, HTML, or PDF for sharing or backup
